com.robopupu.api.util

Interface Listenable<T_Listener>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ListModel<T_EventType,T_Listener>, Model<T_EventType,T_Listener>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractListenable, AbstractListModel, AbstractModel

    public interface Listenable<T_Listener>
    Listenable defines an interface for objects that can have listeners for listening their events. A concrete implementation of Listenable can be annotated using Listenable.Singled annotation to allow only one listener.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Listenable.Singled

      Test if this Listenable is annotated with Listenable.Singled to indicate that this Listenable is allowed to have at most a single listener.
